overview: A Homemade Filmmaker aims to engage with the obstacles of a North East film graduate entering the film industry. We wanted to tell a story that is best told through the language of cinema.  Taking inspiration from documentaries like Shirkers, Stories We Tell and Cameraperson; This short documentary follows a young and hopeful director from Northern England, as he attempts to balance his difficult living situation with his hopes of getting his work recognised.
tagline: How do you become the next big thing?
title: A Homemade Filmmaker
